About

I am a software engineer based in Athens, Greece. I studied computer science in University of Indianapolis from which I earned my B.Sc.

For over a decade I have been delivering software for businesses in diverse industries and sectors. My expertise lies in object-oriented analysis, design and implementation of enterprise software systems. I am passionate abount using technology to transform challenging problems into empowering solutions and crafting exciting ideas into beautiful products.

For the past few years I am a part of a great team in mytrip.com, with whom I create new experiences for travellers around the world.

I live in Athens along with my loving wife Irene. When not working I like to spend time with my friends and family.
